Complete the following Lean 4 code:
```lean4
import Mathlib

open Polynomial Filter Topology Real Set Nat

noncomputable abbrev putnam_2016_a2_solution : ℝ := sorry
-- (3 + √ 5) / 2
/--
Given a positive integer $n$, let $M(n)$ be the largest integer $m$ such that
\[
\binom{m}{n-1} > \binom{m-1}{n}.
\]
Evaluate
\[
\lim_{n \to \infty} \frac{M(n)}{n}.
\]
-/
theorem putnam_2016_a2
    (M : ℕ → ℕ)
    (hM : ∀ n > 0, IsGreatest {m | 0 < m ∧ (m - 1).choose n < m.choose (n - 1)} (M n)) :
    Tendsto (fun n ↦ M n / (n : ℝ)) atTop (𝓝 putnam_2016_a2_solution) :=
  sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_2016_a2
    (M : ℕ → ℕ)
    (hM : ∀ n > 0, IsGreatest {m | 0 < m ∧ (m - 1).choose n < m.choose (n - 1)} (M n)) :
    Tendsto (fun n ↦ M n / (n : ℝ)) atTop (𝓝 putnam_2016_a2_solution) := by
  have h₁ : ∀ n > 0, M n = 2 * n - 1 := by
    intro n hn
    have h₂ := hM n hn
    have h₃ := h₂.1
    have h₄ := h₂.2
    have h₅ : 0 < M n := by
      cases n with
      | zero => contradiction
      | succ n =>
        simp_all [Nat.choose_succ_succ, Nat.div_eq_of_lt]
        <;> omega
    have h₆ : (M n - 1).choose n < M n.choose (n - 1) := by
      cases n with
      | zero => contradiction
      | succ n =>
        simp_all [Nat.choose_succ_succ, Nat.div_eq_of_lt]
        <;> omega
    have h₇ : M n = 2 * n - 1 := by
      cases n with
      | zero => contradiction
      | succ n =>
        have h₈ := h₄
        have h₉ : M n.succ = 2 * n.succ - 1 := by
          simp_all [Nat.choose_succ_succ, Nat.div_eq_of_lt]
          <;> omega
        exact h₉
    exact h₇
  have h₂ : Tendsto (fun n ↦ (M n : ℝ) / n) atTop (𝓝 (3 + Real.sqrt 5) / 2) := by
    simp_all [h₁]
    <;>
    apply tendsto_const_nhds.congr' _
    <;>
    filter_upwards [eventually_gt_atTop 1] with n hn
    <;>
    field_simp [hn]
    <;>
    ring_nf
    <;>
    norm_num
    <;>
    field_simp [hn]
    <;>
    ring_nf
    <;>
    norm_num
    <;>
    field_simp [hn]
    <;>
    ring_nf
    <;>
    norm_num
    <;>
    field_simp [hn]
    <;>
    ring_nf
    <;>
    norm_num
    <;>
    field_simp [hn]
    <;>
    ring_nf
    <;>
    norm_num
    <;>
    field_simp [hn]
    <;>
    ring_nf
    <;>
    norm_num
    <;>
    field_simp [hn]
    <;>
    ring_nf
    <;>
    norm_num
  exact h₂
```

import Mathlib

open Real Nat Topology MeasureTheory
open scoped BigOperators

theorem putnam_2016_a2
    (M : ℕ → ℕ)
    (hM : ∀ n > 0, IsGreatest {m | 0 < m ∧ (m - 1).choose n < m.choose (n - 1)} (M n)) :
    Tendsto (fun n ↦ M n / (n : ℝ)) atTop (𝓝 putnam_2016_a2_solution) := by
  have h₁ : ∀ n > 0, M n = 2 * n - 1 := by
    intro n hn
    have h₂ := hM n hn
    have h₃ := h₂.1
    have h₄ := h₂.2
    have h₅ : 0 < M n := by
      cases n with
      | zero => contradiction
      | succ n =>
        simp_all [Nat.choose_succ_succ, Nat.div_eq_of_lt]
        <;> omega
    have h₆ : (M n - 1).choose n < M n.choose (n - 1) := by
      cases n with
      | zero => contradiction
      | succ n =>
        simp_all [Nat.choose_succ_succ, Nat.div_eq_of_lt]
        <;> omega
    have h₇ : M n = 2 * n - 1 := by
      cases n with
      | zero => contradiction
      | succ n =>
        have h₈ := h₄
        have h₉ : M n.succ = 2 * n.succ - 1 := by
          simp_all [Nat.choose_succ_succ, Nat.div_eq_of_lt]
          <;> omega
        exact h₉
    exact h₇
  have h₂ : Tendsto (fun n ↦ (M n : ℝ) / n) atTop (𝓝 (3 + Real.sqrt 5) / 2) := by
    simp_all [h₁]
    <;>
    apply tendsto_const_nhds.congr' _
    <;>
    filter_upwards [eventually_gt_atTop 1] with n hn

```lean4
import Mathlib

open Polynomial Filter Topology Real Set Nat

noncomputable abbrev putnam_2016_a2_solution : ℝ := sorry
-- (3 + √ 5) / 2
/--
Given a positive integer $n$, let $M(n)$ be the largest integer $m$ such that
\[
\binom{m}{n-1} > \binom{m-1}{n}.
\]
Evaluate
\[
\lim_{n \to \infty} \frac{M(n)}{n}.
\]
-/
theorem putnam_2016_a2
    (M : ℕ → ℕ)
    (hM : ∀ n > 0, IsGreatest {m | 0 < m ∧ (m - 1).choose n < m.choose (n - 1)} (M n)) :
    Tendsto (fun n ↦ M n / (n : ℝ)) atTop (𝓝 putnam_2016_a2_solution) :=
  sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_2016_a2
    (M : ℕ → ℕ)
    (hM : ∀ n > 0, IsGreatest {m | 0 < m ∧ (m - 1).choose n < m.choose (n - 1)} (M n)) :
    Tendsto (fun n ↦ M n / (n : ℝ)) atTop (𝓝 putnam_2016_a2_solution) := by
  have h₁ := hM 1 (by norm_num)
  have h₂ := hM 2 (by norm_num)
  have h₃ := hM 3 (by norm_num)
  have h₄ := hM 4 (by norm_num)
  have h₅ := hM 5 (by norm_num)
  norm_num [isGreatest_iff] at h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄ h₅
  <;>
    simp_all [Nat.div_eq_of_lt]
  <;>
    norm_num
  <;>
    aesop
```

```lean4
import Mathlib

open Polynomial Filter Topology Real Set Nat

noncomputable abbrev putnam_2016_a2_solution : ℝ := sorry
-- (3 + √ 5) / 2
/--
Given a positive integer $n$, let $M(n)$ be the largest integer $m$ such that
\[
\binom{m}{n-1} > \binom{m-1}{n}.
\]
Evaluate
\[
\lim_{n \to \infty} \frac{M(n)}{n}.
\]
-/
theorem putnam_2016_a2
    (M : ℕ → ℕ)
    (hM : ∀ n > 0, IsGreatest {m | 0 < m ∧ (m - 1).choose n < m.choose (n - 1)} (M n)) :
    Tendsto (fun n ↦ M n / (n : ℝ)) atTop (𝓝 putnam_2016_a2_solution) :=
  sorry

```lean4
theorem putnam_2016_a2
    (M : ℕ → ℕ)
    (hM : ∀ n > 0, IsGreatest {m | 0 < m ∧ (m - 1).choose n < m.choose (n - 1)} (M n)) :
    Tendsto (fun n ↦ M n / (n : ℝ)) atTop (𝓝 putnam_2016_a2_solution) := by
  have h₀ : putnam_2016_a2_solution = (3 + Real.sqrt 5) / 2 := by
    norm_num [putnam_2016_a2_solution]
    <;>
    rw [show (3 + Real.sqrt 5) / 2 = (3 + Real.sqrt 5) / 2 by rfl]
    <;>
    norm_num
    <;>
    ring_nf
    <;>
    field_simp [mul_comm]
    <;>
    ring_nf
    <;>
    norm_num
    <;>
    rw [← mul_self_inj (by positivity) (by positivity)]
    <;>
    ring_nf
    <;>
    norm_num
    <;>
    nlinarith [Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 5 by norm_num)]
  rw [h₀]
  have h₁ := hM 1 (by norm_num)
  have h₂ := hM 2 (by norm_num)
  have h₃ := hM 3 (by norm_num)
  have h₄ := hM 4 (by norm_num)
  have h₅ := hM 5 (by norm_num)
  norm_num [IsGreatest] at h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄ h₅
  <;>
  simp_all [Nat.div_eq_of_lt]
  <;>
  norm_num
  <;>
  nlinarith [Real.sqrt_nonneg 5, Real.sq_sqrt (show 0 ≤ 5 by norm_num)]
```

import Mathlib

open Real Nat Topology MeasureTheory
open scoped BigOperators

theorem putnam_2016_a2
    (M : ℕ → ℕ)
    (hM : ∀ n > 0, IsGreatest {m | 0 < m ∧ (m - 1).choose n < m.choose (n - 1)} (M n)) :
    Tendsto (fun n ↦ M n / (n : ℝ)) atTop (𝓝 putnam_2016_a2_solution) := by
  have h₁ := hM 1 (by norm_num)
  have h₂ := hM 2 (by norm_num)
  have h₃ := hM 3 (by norm_num)
  have h₄ := hM 4 (by norm_num)
  have h₅ := hM 5 (by norm_num)
  norm_num [isGreatest_iff] at h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄ h₅
  have h₆ := h₁.1
  have h₇ := h₁.2
  have h₈ := h₂.1
  have h₉ := h₂.2
  have h₁₀ := h₃.1
  have h₁₁ := h₃.2
  have h₁₂ := h₄.1
  have h₁₃ := h₄.2
  have h₁₄ := h₅.1
  have h₁₅ := h₅.2
  simp_all [Nat.div_eq_of_lt]
  <;> norm_num
  <;> linarith
